page.title: 12A day - Clare thomas
page.content: On monday I get up at 7.45am and go downstairs to breakfast. For my breakfast I have cornflakes or shreddies. A cup of tea or an orange drink. After breakfast I wash, dress and brush my teeth. by the time I have seen to my hair it is 8.30 m. I leave home for school at 8.45am where I arrive at 8.55am. There are two school sessions 9am to 12 noon. and 1.15pm to 3.45pm. After the second session I make my way home to watch television and have my tea. For tea I have beans on toast or sausage and chips with cake afterwards. folllowing tea I play with my friends or watch television. At 8.45 pm I go to bed.
